name: Net Efficiency Ltd
description:
We are a specialist UK based eCommerce Agency. From our London office, our team of certified developers and designers have a deep understanding of what drives online sales. Through constant evolution we deliver eCommerce success for clients around the world.
From consultancy through to stunning design and development we create super-fast, highly scalable eCommerce sites, helping you grow and evolve your market. Our certified team create cutting edge websites across all of the leading eCommerce platforms including Magento, Shopify and WooCommerce.
We can solve your back office integrations issues, no matter how complex. We have extensive experience ntegrating with leading ERP systems, such as SAP Business One, Microsoft NAV, Khaos and Remedy with both eCommerce platforms such as Magento as well as custom solutions where clients have bespoke requirements.
READ MORE...
